name: MEC Pack Rat Pillow Stuff Sack
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: A water-resistant stuff sack with a secret: it has a soft fleece lining, so when you flip it inside out and fill it with clothes, it becomes a cozy camping pillow.Made of lightweight and super-strong silicone-treated high-tenacity nylon that's polyurethane-coated for excellent water resistance.Internal microfleece panel is soft against your face.Cord lock closure.
